title: Milo the Brave Bear

character.skinTone: Soft brown fur with white patches

storyDescription: In the peaceful Pine Forest lived a small bear named Milo who was scared of loud sounds. One day, a strong wind blew through the forest, making trees creak and animals panic. Milo wanted to hide, but instead, he put on his red scarf and decided to help. He guided the little animals to safety and showed everyone that courage means helping others even when you're afraid.
